articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: 'There is no reset button': Katy Tur reminds us that war is not a video game
articles.description: MSNBC's Katy Tur ends her show with a stark reminder to viewers: War is not a distant, far-off thing that happens to other people. "There's a reason people who go to war call it hell.," She says. "Because it is."

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Morning Joe 1/8/2020
articles.description: Joe and Mika discuss the big news of the day.

articles.title: Sen. Murphy: the damage already done to US security interests is 'perhaps irreparable'
articles.description: Senator Chris Murphy (D-CT) tells Andrea Mitchell that he's "glad that it appears that we are on a de-escalation path militarily," but contends that US security interests in the Middle East have been harmed in the wake of the Soleimani attack, noting that

articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: In strange speech, Trump appears to back...
articles.description: I'm glad Trump didn't make matters worse this morning, but this was nevertheless the latest in a series of missed opportunities.
articles.content: For those concerned about escalating military tensions with Iran, last night’s retaliatory ballistic-missile strike opened the door to a couple of possible routes for the White House. In light of the modest damage, and the absence of apparent casualties, Dona… [+3794 chars]
